entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is a person who is yelling 'Stupefy!' and checking on Harry's well-being. (Excerpt: "He could hear Cedric yelling ‘Stupefy !’ too..." and "‘Harry!’ he heard Cedric shouting.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is trying to cast spells to defend himself against the spider. (Excerpt: "He raised his wand as the spider opened its pincers once more and shouted ‘Expelliarmus !’" and "‘No,’ Harry called back, panting.")

entities.name: spider
entities.description: The spider is an animal that is attacking Harry. (Excerpt: "the spider opened its pincers once more" and "The two spells combined did what one alone had not: The spi-der keeled over sideways...")

relationships.description: Harry is being attacked by the spider. (Excerpt: "the spider opened its pincers once more" and "It worked — the Disarming Spell made the spider drop him...")
Cedric is helping Harry by checking on his well-being. (Excerpt: "‘Harry!’ he heard Cedric shouting.")
